input_text:
Job Title: Implementation Manager

Location: Minneapolis, MN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Get started on an exciting career at Element!

Element employees make a difference in the lives of others every day. We are re-defining the fleet management industry to be people first, then business – delivering on our promise of a superior client experience. This takes hard work and innovation, and we need more like-minded people on our team.

What We Need

As an Implementation Manager with Element, you will be responsible for continuous improvement of existing client onboarding process toward a best-in-class experience that delights our clients through its focus on surpassing client expectations in targeted implementation cycle times while maintaining the Element expertise in the process measured through business metrics around cycle times and satisfaction surveys.

Partner closely with Sales, FPS and Operations stakeholders to support the New Business Implementation team’s execution to the client project plans, removing any obstacles for the Project Managers. In partnership with the NBI Director, develop and execute a plan to elevate Project Manager and Specialist skillsets to enhance client experience with transition and implementation.

Identify and implement process improvement opportunities related to the implementation process. Engage and optimize team resources for best use of skillset (PM, Specialist, Genpact).Lead & manage team work execution including wing to wing client onboarding, project management, client inventory and contact data loading, communication distribution, and operational case handoffs for successful client onboarding processes.Work collaboratively with the other NBI Manager to implement process efficiencies across the entire team.Provide escalation support & remove roadblocks for implementation progress, to meet or exceed BSC targets.People Leadership: Hires, fosters growth & development, and leads team members to maximize individual and team performance and drive customer service excellence. Including Project mgmt., Stakeholder mgmt., Change mgmt.Lead and represent NBI as a Subject Matter Expert in cross-functional projects as requested by the business.Work with Sales and NBI Director on prospective client support to win business (RFP responses, sales presentations, etc.).Other duties as assigned.

Experience & Requirements

Bachelor's Degree or equivalent business experience; Fleet industry preferred.Strong process-oriented skillset to identify areas for improvement.Experience with managing change across stakeholders preferred.2+ years people management and/or 5+ years cross-functional project management experienceDemonstrated ability to facilitate cross-functional team discussions & influence change.Ability to manage multiple projects/tasks concurrently.Strong communication (both verbal and written) & listening skills.Proficiency in various MS Office software applications, including Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook

What’s In It For You

 A culture of innovation, empowerment, decision-making, and accountability Comprehensive health and welfare benefits that serve the needs of you and your family and foster a culture of wellness Additional benefits and amenities, including paid time-off programs (vacation, sick leave, and holidays) Hybrid work environment for most positions

Applicants will be required to undergo a background check only if and after a conditional offer of employment has been extended.

Element Fleet Management and its wholly owned subsidiaries are an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity, equity, inclusion, and belonging. We are pleased to consider all qualified applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender identity, age, sex, sexual orientation, disability, national origin, Aboriginal/Native American status, protected veterans’ status or any other legally-protected factors. Disability-related accommodations during the application and interview process are available upon request. Should you require an accommodation with our hiring process please send an email to talentacquisition@elementcorp.com or call (800) 665-9744.

Pay transparency Nondiscrimination

Know Your Rights: Workplace discrimination is illegal

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

Developing and executing a plan to elevate Project Manager and Specialist skillsets

Client inventory and contact data loading
Implementing process efficiencies across the entire team
Winning business through RFP responses, sales presentations
